title: Find Maximum
statement:
# Find Maximum

Write a program to find the maximum element in an array.

## Problem Description

Given an array of N integers, find and print the maximum value.

## Input Format

First line: integer N
Second line: N space-separated integers

## Output Format

A single integer - the maximum value.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ N ≤ 10^5
- -10^9 ≤ each element ≤ 10^9
